name: Latenivenatrix
behaviors: Being fairly fragile, these carnivores prefer to scavenge for food, often stealing bits from other carnivore's kills while they aren't looking.
When solo or in smaller groups, they prefer smaller prey or juvenile dinosaurs, but in large numbers, they can take down larger prey.

rules.content: Using its grappling ability for any thing other than fighting is a break of the personal space and/or helping other species rules. No pouncing things for fun.
